page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content:
In the morning I have cereal, egg and toast for breakfast. In the bathroom I clean my teeth with a tooth brush and paste. We wait in the bus shelter for the school bus. When we reach school we get out our books and prepare for assembly .After assembly we do morning work, which usually is maths and writing until dinner time when we have school dinners which are brought from Cleobury. In the afternoon we do some good work and at a quarter past three we go home. We have tea which has been prepared on an electric cooker. I watch a bit of television. Then I go to bed not before saying my prayers then I settle down under my duvet and that's the end of my day.
.
